attributes.action: Get Catthorpe Interchange nr Rugby road improvement funding it needs urgently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Catthorpe Interchange Nr Rugby is a notorious bad Junction off the M6- A14 and M1. This year 3 people have been killed at this jucntion. Road improvements were set to start this Spring but fell through due to lack of funding. How many more lives will be lost before something is done!!!!!!!!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Get Catthorpe Interchange nr Rugby road improvement funding it needs urgently."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19164


Prime Minister's Office
